headline: Top Picks 2026- Hormel Foods Corp. HRL
summary: Hormel Foods Corp. (HRL) is my top pick for income and value investors this year. The packaged foods company has struggled over the past few years due to input cost inflation, changes in sales models, and operational execution challenges. But I view Hormel as a long-term buy, writes Prakash Kolli, editor of Dividend Power.
